item.title: The Designer in the Box
item.description: Last fall, I playtested a game at Metatopia, a game design conference. The game was Ross Rifles, an upcoming TTRPG from Dundas West Games about Canadians in World War I. Daniel Kwan, one of the gameâ€™s authors, did a fantastic job running the game. Daniel is an educator with an encyclopedic knowledge of the Canadian experience in World War I, and he poured that knowledge into the session, describing the guns, rations, and trenches in vivid detail.
